H0.text: The Sun causes the ocean water to evaporate in the water cycle.

H1.text: The Sun creates water droplets in the clouds, influencing the water cycle.

H2.text: The Sun forces water to drain back into the ocean is how it most affects the water cycle.

H3.text: The Sun makes the clouds produce precipitation, which is how it most affects the water cycle.

A4.text: The energy from the sun heats the water in oceans, lakes, streams, rivers, seas, ponds, etc.

A5.text: The water cycle is powered by the energy emitted from the sun.
